summary: Frontend testing of new features: Social login buttons, Virtual Pet Sounds tab with audioManager, and VideoPlayer with Pexels videos. Auth page social buttons working correctly. Sounds tab UI works with synthesized fallback. Video player integrated but Pexels CDN videos return 403.

integration_issues.issue: Pexels video CDN URLs return 403 Forbidden - videos fail to load
integration_issues.note: Video player component and controls work correctly. Issue is with Pexels CDN access restrictions requiring API key or proper referrer.

integration_issues.issue: Freesound.org CDN audio URLs return 404 Not Found
integration_issues.note: audioManager has proper fallback to Web Audio API synthesized sounds which work correctly

buttons_verified.name: Apple
buttons_verified.behavior: Shows toast: 'Apple Sign In requires Apple Developer Account setup'

buttons_verified.name: Facebook
buttons_verified.behavior: Shows toast: 'Facebook Login requires Facebook Developer Account setup'

auth_page_social_login.note: Apple and Facebook are MOCKED - UI only, shows toast about developer account setup

virtual_pet_sounds_tab.k9_sound_library_header: Present - 'Tap to hear TestDog make different sounds!'
virtual_pet_sounds_tab.audioManager_integration: Uses audioManager.js with freesound.org CDN URLs + Web Audio API fallback

components_verified: MiniVideoPlayer component integrated in lesson modal
Video Tutorial section with title and description
video element with Pexels src URL
Video controls: play, skip back/forward, volume, fullscreen, restart
video_player_in_training.issue: Pexels video CDN returns 403 - 'Failed to load video' displayed
video_player_in_training.cause: Pexels direct video URLs require API access or proper referrer headers

pexels_video_cdn.issue: Forbidden - requires Pexels API key or embed URLs

freesound_audio_cdn.issue: Not Found - URLs may have changed or require authentication

mocked_apis.Apple Sign In: UI-only - shows toast about requiring Apple Developer Account
mocked_apis.Facebook Login: UI-only - shows toast about requiring Facebook Developer Account

action_items: MEDIUM: Fix Pexels video URLs - Either use Pexels API with proper authentication OR use alternative free video hosting (e.g., Cloudinary, YouTube embeds, or self-hosted videos)
LOW: Update freesound.org audio URLs or use alternative audio CDN (current fallback synthesized sounds work well)
critical_code_review_comments: audioManager.js properly implements fallback to Web Audio API synthesized sounds when CDN fails - good design pattern
VideoPlayer.jsx has proper error handling with 'Failed to load video' message and retry button
Social login buttons correctly MOCKED with informative toast messages for Apple/Facebook
All interactive elements have proper data-testid attributes for testing

success_rate.frontend: 85% - Auth buttons 100%, Sounds tab 100%, Video player 60% (component works, CDN fails)

seed_data_creation: Created dog 'TestBuddy' for training page testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Auth social buttons all working (Apple/Facebook MOCKED). Sounds tab working with synthesized fallback sounds. Video player component integrated but Pexels CDN videos fail with 403 - need alternative video hosting. Email login working with test credentials.
